sqlMap.select: select g.id id,g.name,g.avatar,g.create_time,g.approved,g.profile,g.address, g.tel,g.user_id,g.province,g.shelves,g.city,g.tag,g.hot,rel.photo from t_gym g left join t_gym_photo_rel rel on g.id = rel.gym_id where g.delete_status = 1 order by g.id DESC

select g.id id,g.name,g.avatar,g.create_time,g.approved,g.profile,g.address, g.tel,g.user_id,g.province,g.shelves,g.city,g.tag,g.hot,rel.photo from t_gym g left join t_gym_photo_rel rel on g.id = rel.gym_id where g.delete_status = 1 and g.id = #id# order by g.id DESC
select * from t_gym where delete_status = 1 order by id
select name from t_gym where delete_status=0 and id=#gymid#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_gym(avatar,name,create_time,approved,delete_status,province,city,address,tel,profile,user_id,tag,hot) values(#avatar#,#name#,#create_time#,#approved#,#delete_status#,#province#,#city#,#address#,#tel#,#profile#,#user_id#,#tag#,#hot#)
